name: X-MiGuFighters: Stripper Anya
description:
WARNING: NSFW

X-MiGuPLAY returns in 2018 with "X-MiGu Fighters: f/ Stripper Anya", a retro inspired 1 on 1 fighting game!

X-MiGu Fighters marks X-MiGuPLAY's 2nd PC title which honors the late 90's/2000's arcade fighting game craze! More updates and previews to come as development continues.

X-MiGuFighters will feature 12 unique playable characters with individual story lines, 2 un-lockable characters and a 2 player VS mode. The video and screenshots posted here on this store page are the "First Look" images.

If you are not familiar with our company, we released our first PC title in 2017: "STRIPPER ANYA: DEMON SLAYER"
http://store.steampowered.com/app/671630/STRIPPER_ANYA_DEMON_SLAYER/

X-MiGuPLAY is working hard to improve our products with each passing release. X-MiGuFighters features completely newly written game mechanics and is coded from scratch like all of our titles. X-MiGuFighters also features freshly designed characters.



-M
